verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, Now it came to pass in the seventh בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba with him came יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El [that] Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֣ה <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <S%H476><s%> 'e-li-sha-Ma' of Elishama מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> miz-Ze-ra' of the seed הַ֠מְּלוּכָה <S%H4410><s%> Ham-me-lu-chah royal וְרַבֵּ֨י <S%H7227><s%> ve-rab-Bei and the princes הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech of the king וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> va-'a-sa-Rah even ten אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4709><s%> ham-mitz-Pa-tah; to Mizpah וַיֹּ֨אכְלוּ <S%H398><s%> vai-Yo-che-lu and there they did eat שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there לֶ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah. Mizpah

וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Kam Then arose יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֜ה <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> va-'a-Se-ret and the ten הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים׀ <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for וַ֠יַּכּוּ <S%H5221><s%> Vai-yak-ku that were with him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֧ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שָׁפָ֛ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan of Shaphan בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev with the sword וַיָּ֣מֶת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-met and slew אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom הִפְקִ֥יד <S%H6485><s%> hif-Kid had made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- him whom the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. over the land

וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <S%H3064><s%> hai-ye-hu-Dim, all the Jews אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who הָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become אִתּ֤וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu that were with him [even] with Gedaliah בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah, at Mizpah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> hak-kas-Dim and the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נִמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> nim-tze-'u- that were found שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei there [and] the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah also slew יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El. Ishmael

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi happened בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni And it came to pass the second לְהָמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> le-ha-Mit after he had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֑הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu; Gedaliah וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and no man לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יָדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'. knew

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u That there came אֲ֠נָשִׁים <S%H376><s%> 'A-na-shim men מִשְּׁכֶ֞ם <S%H7927><s%> mish-she-Chem from Shechem מִשִּׁל֤וֹ <S%H7887><s%> mish-shi-Lo from Shiloh וּמִשֹּֽׁמְרוֹן֙ <S%H8111><s%> u-mish-sho-me-rOn and from Samaria שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <S%H8084><s%> she-mo-Nim [even] fourscore אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, men מְגֻלְּחֵ֥י <S%H1548><s%> me-gul-le-Chei shaven זָקָ֛ן <S%H2206><s%> za-Kan having their beards וּקְרֻעֵ֥י <S%H7167><s%> u-ke-ru-'Ei rent בְגָדִ֖ים <S%H899><s%> ve-ga-Dim and their clothes וּמִתְגֹּֽדְדִ֑ים <S%H1413><s%> u-mit-go-de-Dim; and having cut וּמִנְחָ֤ה <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah themselves with offerings וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <S%H3828><s%> u-le-vo-Nah and incense בְּיָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam, in their hand לְהָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi to bring בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit [them] to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַ֠יֵּצֵא <S%H3318><s%> Vai-ye-tze went forth יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El And Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֤ה <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah לִקְרָאתָם֙ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Tam to meet מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> ham-mitz-Pah, from Mizpah הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech all along הָלֹ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch as he went וּבֹכֶ֑ה <S%H1058><s%> u-vo-Cheh; them weeping וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּפְגֹ֣שׁ <S%H6298><s%> kif-Gosh and it came to pass as he met אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer them he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to בֹּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Bo-'u unto them Come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu to Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָֽם׃ <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam. of Ahikam ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi turned כְּבוֹאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> ke-vo-'Am And it was [so] when they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch into the midst הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; of the city וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֞ם <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-cha-Tem slew יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El that Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְתַנְיָה֙ <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch them [and cast them] into the midst הַבּ֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> hab-Bor, of the pit ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim and the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> it-To. But

וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> va-'a-sa-Rah But ten אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men נִמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> nim-tze-'u- were found בָ֗ם Vam, וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru among them that said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'eL unto Ishmael אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תְּמִתֵ֔נוּ <S%H4191><s%> te-mi-Te-nu, Slay כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- us not for we have לָ֤נוּ La-nu מַטְמֹנִים֙ <S%H4301><s%> mat-mo-Nim treasures בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, in the field חִטִּ֥ים <S%H2406><s%> chit-Tim of wheat וּשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8184><s%> u-se-'o-Rim and of barley וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-She-men and of oil וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash; and of honey וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <S%H2308><s%> vai-yech-Dal So he forbare וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not הֱמִיתָ֖ם <S%H4191><s%> he-mi-Tam and slew בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch them not among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem. their brethren

וַיִּ֣שְׁבְּ׀ <S%H7617><s%> vai-Yishb carried away captive יִ֠שְׁמָעֵאל <S%H3458><s%> Yish-ma-'el Then Ishmael אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit all the residue הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּמִּצְפָּ֗ה <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah, that [were] in Mizpah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not daughters הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech [even] the king's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and all the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rim that remained בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> bam-mitz-Pah, in Mizpah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִפְקִ֗יד <S%H6485><s%> hif-Kid, had committed נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <S%H5018><s%> ne-vu-zar-'a-Dan whom Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- the captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <S%H2876><s%> tab-ba-Chim, of the guard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu to Gedaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחִיקָ֑ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam; of Ahikam וַיִּשְׁבֵּם֙ <S%H7617><s%> vai-yish-Bem carried them away captive יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El and Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֔ה <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Yah, of Nethaniah וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and proceeded לַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> la-'a-Vor to go over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon ס sa-Mek
